headline: Mastercard Reshapes Workforce And AI Focus As Valuation Shows Apparent Discount
summary: Mastercard (NYSE:MA) plans to reduce its global workforce by 4%, marking a significant organizational shift following a period of strong earnings and growth momentum. The company is rolling out Mastercard Agent Suite, a new AI driven offering aimed at agentic commerce, with an emphasis on responsible and secure AI use. Mastercard is also extending its key credit partnership with Capital One, reinforcing a long running relationship in consumer and commercial cards. For you as an investor,...
